typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		body as (access_token as string, expires_in as integer, scope as string, token_type as string),
		headers as [string,string]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	httpMethod: 'POST',
	body: 'grant_type=password&client_id=ditio_risa_as&username=%2B479804041298989&password=pt-SQ091E34%231_d%23%21&client_secret=5U3Wj8qw2BxCbAmFZ9zoSGPiGU4QuqwTwP6PSNpGiOe2FzvGCPWeUSf6UApO8YDE',
	timeout: 30,
	requestInterval: 0,
	headers: ['Content-Type' -> 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'],
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'documentPerLine']) ~> APIToken
APIToken derive(System = 'API-Ditio',
		Token = body.access_token,
		Date = toString(currentDate())) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		System as string,
		Token as string,
		Date as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		System,
		Token,
		Date
	)) ~> sinkSettings
